trans-unit.source: Adjust the zoom level of the window. The original size is 0 and each increment above (e.g. 1) or below (e.g. -1) represents zooming 20% larger or smaller. You can also enter decimals to adjust the zoom level with a finer granularity.

trans-unit.source: If enabled, will automatically change to high contrast theme if Windows is using a high contrast theme, and to dark theme when switching away from a Windows high contrast theme.

trans-unit.source: If enabled, double clicking the application icon in the title bar will close the window and the window cannot be dragged by the icon. This setting only has an effect when `#window.titleBarStyle#` is set to `custom`.
trans-unit.target: If enabled, double clicking the application icon in the title bar will close the window and the window cannot be dragged by the icon. This setting only has an effect when `#window.titleBarStyle#` is set to `custom`.

trans-unit.source: Adjust the appearance of the window title bar. On Linux and Windows, this setting also affects the application and context menu appearances. Changes require a full restart to apply.
trans-unit.target: Adjust the appearance of the window title bar. On Linux and Windows, this setting also affects the application and context menu appearances. Changes require a full restart to apply.

trans-unit.source: Enables macOS Sierra window tabs. Note that changes require a full restart to apply and that native tabs will disable a custom title bar style if configured.
trans-unit.target: macOS Sierra pencere sekmelerini etkinleştirir. Değişikliklerin uygulanması için tam yeniden başlatma gerekeceğini ve yerel sekmelerin, eğer yapılandırılmışsa özel başlık çubuğu stilini devre dışı bıracağını unutmayın.

trans-unit.source: Controls if native full-screen should be used on macOS. Disable this option to prevent macOS from creating a new space when going full-screen.
trans-unit.target: Controls if native full-screen should be used on macOS. Disable this option to prevent macOS from creating a new space when going full-screen.

trans-unit.source: If enabled, clicking on an inactive window will both activate the window and trigger the element under the mouse if it is clickable. If disabled, clicking anywhere on an inactive window will activate it only and a second click is required on the element.
trans-unit.target: Etkinleştirilirse, aktif olmayan bir pencereye tıklandığında hem pencere etkinleştirilir hem de farenin üzerinde bulunduğu öge tıklanabilir durumdaysa tetiklenir. Devre dışı bırakılırsa, aktif olmayan bir pencerenin herhangi bir yerine tıklandığında sadece o pencere etkinleştirilir ve öge için ikinci bir tıklama gerekir.

Identifier of the view. This should be unique across all views. It is recommended to include your extension id as part of the view id. trans-unit.source: Controls the default direction of editors that are opened side by side (e.g. from the explorer). By default, editors will open on the right hand side of the currently active one. If changed to `down`, the editors will open below the currently active one.
trans-unit.target: Controls the default direction of editors that are opened side by side (e.g. from the explorer). By default, editors will open on the right hand side of the currently active one. If changed to `down`, the editors will open below the currently active one.

trans-unit.source: Controls the behavior of empty editor groups when the last tab in the group is closed. When enabled, empty groups will automatically close. When disabled, empty groups will remain part of the grid.
trans-unit.target: Controls the behavior of empty editor groups when the last tab in the group is closed. When enabled, empty groups will automatically close. When disabled, empty groups will remain part of the grid.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether an editor is revealed in any of the visible groups if opened. If disabled, an editor will prefer to open in the currently active editor group. If enabled, an already opened editor will be revealed instead of opened again in the currently active editor group. Note that there are some cases where this setting is ignored, e.g. when forcing an editor to open in a specific group or to the side of the currently active group.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether an editor is revealed in any of the visible groups if opened. If disabled, an editor will prefer to open in the currently active editor group. If enabled, an already opened editor will be revealed instead of opened again in the currently active editor group. Note that there are some cases where this setting is ignored, e.g. when forcing an editor to open in a specific group or to the side of the currently active group.

trans-unit.source: Navigate between open files using mouse buttons four and five if provided.
trans-unit.target: Navigate between open files using mouse buttons four and five if provided.

trans-unit.source: Restores the last view state (e.g. scroll position) when re-opening files after they have been closed.
trans-unit.target: Restores the last view state (e.g. scroll position) when re-opening files after they have been closed.

trans-unit.source: Controls if the centered layout should automatically resize to maximum width when more than one group is open. Once only one group is open it will resize back to the original centered width.
trans-unit.target: Controls if the centered layout should automatically resize to maximum width when more than one group is open. Once only one group is open it will resize back to the original centered width.

trans-unit.source: Controls if the number of opened editors should be limited or not. When enabled, less recently used editors that are not dirty will close to make space for newly opening editors.
trans-unit.target: Controls if the number of opened editors should be limited or not. When enabled, less recently used editors that are not dirty will close to make space for newly opening editors.

trans-unit.source: Controls the maximum number of opened editors. Use the `#workbench.editor.limit.perEditorGroup#` setting to control this limit per editor group or across all groups.
trans-unit.target: Controls the maximum number of opened editors. Use the `#workbench.editor.limit.perEditorGroup#` setting to control this limit per editor group or across all groups.

trans-unit.source: Controls if the limit of maximum opened editors should apply per editor group or across all editor groups.
trans-unit.target: Controls if the limit of maximum opened editors should apply per editor group or across all editor groups.

trans-unit.source: Controls the number of recently used commands to keep in history for the command palette. Set to 0 to disable command history.
trans-unit.target: Komut paleti geçmişinde tutulacak son kullanılan komutların sayısını denetler. Komut geçmişini kapatmak için 0 olarak ayarlayın.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the last typed input to the command palette should be restored when opening it the next time.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the last typed input to the command palette should be restored when opening it the next time.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether Quick Open should close automatically once it loses focus.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether Quick Open should close automatically once it loses focus.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the last typed input to Quick Open should be restored when opening it the next time.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether the last typed input to Quick Open should be restored when opening it the next time.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether opening settings also opens an editor showing all default settings.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether opening settings also opens an editor showing all default settings.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether to use the split JSON editor when editing settings as JSON.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether to use the split JSON editor when editing settings as JSON.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether opening keybinding settings also opens an editor showing all default keybindings.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether opening keybinding settings also opens an editor showing all default keybindings.

trans-unit.source: Controls the location of the sidebar and activity bar. They can either show on the left or right of the workbench.
trans-unit.target: Controls the location of the sidebar and activity bar. They can either show on the left or right of the workbench.

trans-unit.source: Controls the default location of the panel (terminal, debug console, output, problems). It can either show at the bottom, right, or left of the workbench.
trans-unit.target: Controls the default location of the panel (terminal, debug console, output, problems). It can either show at the bottom, right, or left of the workbench.

trans-unit.source: Controls the visibility of the status bar at the bottom of the workbench.

trans-unit.source: Controls the visibility of view header actions. View header actions may either be always visible, or only visible when that view is focused or hovered over.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether specific views will have a context menu entry allowing them to be moved to a new container. Currently, this setting only affects the outline view and views contributed by extensions.
trans-unit.target: Controls whether specific views will have a context menu entry allowing them to be moved to a new container. Currently, this setting only affects the outline view and views contributed by extensions.

trans-unit.source: Controls font aliasing method in the workbench.
trans-unit.target: Controls font aliasing method in the workbench.

trans-unit.source: Sub-pixel font smoothing. On most non-retina displays this will give the sharpest text.
trans-unit.target: Alt-piksel yazı tipi yumuşatma. Bu, çoğu retina olmayan ekranda en keskin metni verir.

trans-unit.source: Smooth the font on the level of the pixel, as opposed to the subpixel. Can make the font appear lighter overall.
trans-unit.target: Alt-pikselin tersine, pikselin seviyesine göre yazı tipini yumuşat. Yazı tipinin genel olarak daha açık görünmesini sağlayabilir.

trans-unit.source: Disables font smoothing. Text will show with jagged sharp edges.
trans-unit.target: Yazı tipi yumuşatmayı devre dışı bırakır. Metin pürüzlü keskin kenarlarla gösterilir.

trans-unit.source: Applies `default` or `antialiased` automatically based on the DPI of displays.

trans-unit.source: Determines which settings editor to use by default.
trans-unit.target: Determines which settings editor to use by default.
